author: Matthias Lataille
description: A riff on the White Negroni with the cognac replacing half of the gin. Fittingly 'Charente' references the Cognac area of France.
name: Charente White Negroni
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
30 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and STIR
